divs: Sighting Detailssame type of ufo i reported about a week ago ... the light goes from dim sometimes to very bright and red and it often was flying in big up and down motions - also seemed to have a glow around it I didn't stare at it too much though because i'd rather not have this thing notice me , whatever it might be...
